name: 廖硃岑
objective:
本課程從建築物構築方法和材料特性出發，介紹構法的歷史以及創新應用。內容包括現行工法的運用，以及先進工法的突破。藉由課程引導和案例介紹，培養學生構法知識與應用能力，提升學理與實務上的知能。
This course starts from building construction methods, introduces the technical history, innovative applications of construction methods. The content includes the application of current construction methods, as well as the breakthrough of advanced construction. Through course guidance and case study, students will cultivate their knowledge of construction method, and enhance their ability in academic theory and practice.
schedule:
1.	Course introduction.
2-3.	Common construction methods in Taiwan: building composition and material properties
1.	Taiwan case study: introduce the construction methods commonly used for new projects with different purposes
2.	Reading report-1
6-7.   Advanced building construction and materials: the evolution and trend of building construction methods.
8.  Foreign case discussion: Introduce the advanced construction methods and building materials with different purposes.
9-10.   Mid-term week：Mid-term report
11-12.  The application of smart buildings in construction methods
13.  Reading report-2
14.  Foreign case discussion: The trend of smart architecture
15-16.  Special speech for future architecture
17-18.  Final week：Final report
scorePolicy:
1.	Attendance：Absent for three or more lessons will fail the course.
2.	Attendance 20%
Reading report 20%
Mid-term report 30%
Final report 30%
materials:
1.	D. Michelle Addington, Daniel L. Schodek, Smart Materials and New Technologies for Architecture and design professions, Harvard University, 2005.
2.	Axel Ritter, Smart building in architecture, interior architecture and design, Birkhauser Architecture, 2006.
3.	John Fernandez, Material Architecture, Architectural press, 2006
